text: Problem Child is a 1990 American dark comedy movie directed by Dennis Dugan. It stars John Ritter, Michael Oliver, Amy Yasbeck, Gilbert Gottfried, Jack Warden, and Michael Richards. It was released on July 27, 1990 to strong negative critic reviews. The movie performed good at the box office. It had two sequels, Problem Child 2 (1991) and Problem Child 3: Junior in Love (1995). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1990 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies about children Category:Movies about adoption Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Dennis Dugan
title: Problem Child (movie)
